class.name: Bullet
class.description: Representation of a controllable bullet. A [Bullet] is a minimal representation of a simulated projectile. It does not perform any automatic processing or colliding of its own, instead relying on a [BulletServer] or other external script to drive it. It contains state information; a [CanvasItem] [RID] to draw to; a pair of [BulletTexture] and [BUlletPath] resources which define its appearance, collision information, and behaviour; and a customizable [Dictionary].

method.name: can_collide
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Bullet]'s type contains a collision shape and an active collsion mask.

method.name: get_ci_rid
method.description: Returns the [RID] of the [CanvasItem] associated with this [Bullet].

method.name: get_direction
method.description: Returns a [Vector2] reprenting this [Bullet]'s current direction of travel.

method.name: get_path
method.description: Returns the [BulletPath] currently held by this [Bullet].

method.name: get_position
method.description: Returns the current position of this [Bullet].

method.name: get_speed
method.description: Returns the current speed of this [Bullet].

method.name: get_rotation
method.description: Returns the current rotation of this [Bullet] in radians.

method.name: get_texture
method.description: Returns the [BulletTexture] currently held by this [Bullet].

method.name: get_time
method.description: Returns the amount of time this [Bullet] has been active since spawning, in seconds.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Returns a transform representing this [Bullet]'s current position, rotation, and the scale.

method.name: get_velocity
method.description: Returns the current velocity of this [Bullet].

method.name: is_popped
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Bullet] has been popped or is otherwise inactive.

method.name: pop
method.description: Marks this [Bullet] as inactive and ready to be cleaned up by the server, and disables its visibility.

method.name: set_position
method.description: Updates the current position of this [Bullet].

method.name: set_path
method.description: Sets the [BulletPath] that will be used to define this [Bullet]'s behaviour.

method.name: set_texture
method.description: Sets the [BulletTexture] that will be used to define this [Bullet]'s appearance. Causes the [CanvasItem] to update to reflect texture or material changes.

method.name: spawn
method.description: Resets this [Bullet]'s age and state, then deploys it at the given [code]position[/code], in [code]direction[/code], with the traits defined by [code]path[/code] and [code]texture[/code].

method.name: update
method.description: Updates this [Bullet]'s age and position, using its currently loaded [BulletPath]. Will automatically pop if the path has a lifetime limit set and this bullet's live time exceeds it.
